医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
凯斯勒基金会研究人员获得 170 万美元赠款，用于改善 TBI 患者的生活凯斯勒基金会的科学家获得了新泽西州脑损伤研究委员会的四项资助，总额近 170 万美元，用于基于各种旨在改善创伤性脑损伤 (TBI) 患者生活的新颖方法的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Kessler-Foundation-researchers-receive-2417-million-in-grants-to-improve-lives-of-TBI-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Kessler-Foundation-researchers-receive-2417-million-in-grants-to-improve-lives-of-TBI-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be4a2aba-f53e-4c2a-9e5f-705a84316f52 Tue, 15 Aug 2023 23:22:55 -0400 Kessler Foundation researchers receive $1.7 million in grants to improve lives of TBI patients
科学家发现与黑人男性转移性前列腺癌相关的潜在生物标志物City of Hope 是美国最大的癌症研究和治疗组织之一，也是糖尿病和其他危及生命的疾病的领先研究中心，其科学家们在患有糖尿病和转移性前列腺癌的男性中发现了一种细胞代谢过程，该过程可以总有一天会改进对患有这些疾病的黑人的检测和治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Scientists-discover-pottial-biomarkers-linked-to-metastatic-prostate-cancer-in-Black-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Scientists-discover-pottial-biomarkers-linked-to-metastatic-prostate-cancer-in-Black-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d6c66f8b-7d11-4b24-b52e-15640db48279 Tue, 15 Aug 2023 23:02:53 -0400 Scientists discover potential biomarkers linked to metastatic prostate cancer in Black men
美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 授予数百万美元拨款，用于开发糖尿病足溃疡的先进治疗方法来自寺崎生物医学创新研究所 (TIBI) 和内布拉斯加大学医学中心 (UNMC) 的研究团队获得了美国国立卫生研究院的数百万美元拨款，用于开发一种卓越的、多管齐下的糖尿病伤口治疗方法足部溃疡（DFU）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Multimillion-dollar-NIH-grant-awarded-to-develop-advanced-treatment-for-diabetic-foot-ulcers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Multimillion-dollar-NIH-grant-awarded-to-develop-advanced-treatment-for-diabetic-foot-ulcers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=769987cf-32de-4c2f-953e-67a8d7981229 Tue, 15 Aug 2023 22:56:21 -0400 Multimillion-dollar NIH grant awarded to develop advanced treatment for diabetic foot ulcers
极端高温会加剧弱势群体的认知能力下降2023 年 7 月是有记录以来最热的一个月，凤凰城等城市连续几周经历破纪录的热浪。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Extreme-heat-can-worsen-cognitive-decline-among-vulnerable-groups.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Extreme-heat-can-worsen-cognitive-decline-among-vulnerable-groups.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ffdf1b2a-57a1-44da-9431-8578154ed14f Tue, 15 Aug 2023 22:53:17 -0400 Extreme heat can worsen cognitive decline among vulnerable groups
使用新的“多样性指数”评估医学研究可以促进更好的健康结果科学期刊和研究论文通过称为“影响因子”的指标进行评估，该指标基于某篇论文被其他论文引用的次数。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Evaluating-medical-research-using-a-new-e2809cdiversity-indexe2809d-could-promote-better-health-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Evaluating-medical-research-using-a-new-e2809cdiversity-indexe2809d-could-promote-better-health-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=293881b0-1deb-4aba-b793-cd799bc48737 Tue, 15 Aug 2023 22:36:36 -0400 Evaluating medical research using a new “diversity index” could promote better health outcomes
研究显示，许多抗癌药物在没有明确疗效证据的情况下获得批准新的抗癌药物正在快速上市，然后才能评估其对患者的长期有效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Many-cancer-drugs-approved-without-clear-evidence-of-benefit-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Many-cancer-drugs-approved-without-clear-evidence-of-benefit-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=00f5eb8f-a4e6-424c-a9f1-b36fa7b3b4e6 Tue, 15 Aug 2023 20:20:09 -0400 Many cancer drugs approved without clear evidence of benefit, study shows
瑞士首次使用质子放射治疗治疗食管肿瘤今天，一名 67 岁的食道癌患者在 Paul Scherrer Institute PSI 接受了质子（即带正电粒子）辐射的治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Proton-radiotherapy-used-for-the-first-time-in-Switzerland-to-treat-esophageal-tumor.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Proton-radiotherapy-used-for-the-first-time-in-Switzerland-to-treat-esophageal-tumor.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22bb0951-9383-4cd4-9a7f-ceeb45ac4b9e Tue, 15 Aug 2023 20:05:21 -0400 Proton radiotherapy used for the first time in Switzerland to treat esophageal tumor
研究确定肠易激综合征患者与精神疾病之间的遗传相关性卑尔根大学和奥斯陆大学研究人员的发现为大脑和肠道之间的联系提供了新的线索。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Research-identizes-genic-correlations- Between-患者-with-irritable-bowel-syndrome-and-psychiatric-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Research-identizes-genic-correlations- Between-患者-with-irritable-bowel-syndrome-and-psychiatric-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d9ffefd-6625-41b6-b16d-67fccbc831b9 Tue, 15 Aug 2023 19:40:54 -0400 Research identifies genetic correlations between patients with irritable bowel syndrome and psychiatric disorders
凯撒医疗机构承诺提供更好、更便宜的医疗服务，其全国扩张面临广泛质疑当监管机构审查 Kaiser Permanente 收购宾夕法尼亚州备受推崇的医疗系统的提议时，医疗保健专家仍然对 4 月份宣布的这项意外交易如何履行这家管理医疗巨头改善护理和降低患者费用的承诺感到困惑，其中包括它的家乡加利福尼亚州。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Promising-better-cheaper-care-Kaiser-Permanentee28099s-national-expansion-faces-wide-skepticism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Promising-better-cheaper-care-Kaiser-Permanentee28099s-national-expansion-faces-wide-skepticism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4db1884-8f16-4158-870a-7fde7f165c39 Tue, 15 Aug 2023 19:12:27 -0400 Promising better, cheaper care, Kaiser Permanente’s national expansion faces wide skepticism
